description:
crypto/x509: add hints for authority errors.

The errors resulting from X.509 authority errors are rather unhelpful
in the case of obscure failures. This change adds hints to the error
message in the case that a candidate parent was rejected.

There can be several rejected candidates for any given certificate
but the case of there being just one is the dominant one. In order
to keep the error messages simple, this change only considers a single
error.

Fixes issue 5058.
subject: crypto/x509: add hints for authority errors.
